duties_responsibilities.duty: Operating powered industrial trucks (PIT) and performing daily checks on equipment prior to operating.
Following all safety guidelines to ensure a safe working environment, including hazard recognition and reporting.
Accurately picking/packing orders using established work practices and restocking picking bins.
Safely moving product to and from pallet racks with powered material handling equipment.
Loading/unloading trucks and organizing warehouse storage space effectively.
Performing other general warehouse tasks assigned.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED; 1-2 years of related experience as a certified equipment operator; knowledge of RF scanners and basic computer skills are preferred.
